title: Add issueDescription textarea to issue creation form

requirements.text: Add a new textarea field named `issueDescription` to the issue creation form, allowing the user to enter a multi-line description of the issue.

quotes: Add a new textarea field for issueDescription to the issue creation form.

acceptanceCriteria: The issue creation form displays a clearly labeled textarea for `issueDescription` (English user-facing label).
The textarea supports multi-line input (Enter inserts a new line and does not accidentally submit the form).
The `issueDescription` value is included in the formâ€™s internal state and is preserved while the user continues the issue creation flow.
If the form has a review/confirmation step, the entered `issueDescription` is displayed in that summary.
Submitting the issue creation form includes the `issueDescription` value in the submission payload used by the app.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose using existing UI components instead).
Do not edit immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not add new backend canister methods or change backend data models as part of this request.
Do not redesign unrelated parts of the issue creation flow.
